body:
For anyone looking for a lighter-weight Temporal (eg for local dev or testing environments), @jlegrone has started this project that does exactly that: https://github.com/DataDog/temporalite

figured i'd pop it in here in case anyone searches for SQLite or Temporal without Docker containers. more updates to come!

comments.body: We met today and agreed that we want to upstream temporalite's sql plugin https://github.com/DataDog/temporalite/tree/main/internal/common/persistence/sql/sqlplugin so we can run our test suite on them and make sqlite persistence available to others

title: Feature Request: Upstream sqlite persistence plugin from temporalite
